clean_data: Operations Program Manager Operations Program Manager Operations Program Manager Champaign IL I am a professional program manager with 15 years of IT experience My technical experience give me a high advantage deal complex IT programs including leading resources understanding their assigned tasks and translating any technical information to upper management My strengths include the ability to manage big teams working with crossfunctional teams problem solving and creating satisfied customers The skills I can bring immediately to the job are 1 Preparing ProgramProject Management
